= Commands for Arch Linux Installation =
[[https://wiki.archlinux.org/title/Installation_guide|Arch wiki installation guide]]

==== Network Commands ====
[[https://wiki.archlinux.org/title/Installation_guide#Connect_to_the_internet|Network commmands]]

==== System Clock ====
{{{bash
timedatectl set-ntp true 
timedatectl status
}}}

==== Partition the disks ====
{{{bash
fdisk -l
fdisk /dev/sda
> g
> n
> <ENTER>
> <ENTER>
> +550M
> n
> <ENTER>
> <ENTER>
> +2G
> n
> <ENTER>
> <ENTER>
> <ENTER>
> t
> 1
> 1
> t
> 2
> 19
> w
}}}

==== Format the partitions ====
{{{bash
mkfs.fat -F32 /dev/sda1
mkswap /dev/sda2
swapon /dev/sda2
mkfs.ext4 /dev/sda3
}}}

==== Mount the partition  ====
{{{bash
mount /dev/sda3 /mnt
}}}

==== Install basic packages ====
{{{bash
pacstrap /mnt base linux linux-firmware vim
}}}

==== Fstab ====
{{{bash
genfstab -U /mnt >> /mnt/etc/fstab
}}}

==== Chroot ====
{{{bash
arch-chroot /mnt
}}}

==== Time zone ====
{{{bash
ln -sf /usr/share/zoneinfo/Asia/Kolkata /etc/localtime
hwclock --systohc
}}}

==== Localization ====
{{{bash
vim /etc/locale.gen
# uncomment en_US.UTF-8 UTF-8
# uncomment en_IN.UTF-8
locale-gen
vim /etc/locale.conf
# add LANG=en_US.UTF-8
}}}

==== Network Configuration ====
{{{bash
vim /etc/hostname
# add linuxarch
vim /etc/hosts
# add the following
127.0.0.1   localhost
::1         localhost
127.0.1.1   linuxarch
}}}

==== Users ====
{{{bash
passwd
# set password
useradd -m shawn
passwd shawn
set password for shawn
usermod -aG wheel,audio,video,optical,storage shawn
pacman -S sudo
EDITOR=vim visudo
# uncomment %wheel ALL=(ALL) ALL
}}}

==== Boot Loader ====
{{{bash
pacman -S grub efibootmgr dosfstools os-prober mtools
mkdir /boot/EFI
mount /dev/sda1 /boot/EFI
grub-install --target=x86_64-efi --bootloader-id=grub_uefi --recheck
grub-mkconfig -o /boot/grub/grub.cfg
}}}

==== Final commands ====
{{{bash
pacman -S networkmanager git base-devel
systemctl enable NetworkManager
exit
umount -l /mnt
reboot
}}}

==== Setting up xorg, xmonad etc... ====
======= Paru =======
{{{bash
git clone https://aur.archlinux.org/paru.git
cd paru
makepkg -si
}}}
